description: The `ballerinax/sap.s4hana.api_physical_inventory_doc_srv` package provides APIs that enable seamless integration with the [Physical Inventory Documents - Read, Creat API v1.0.0](https://api.sap.com/api/API_PHYSICAL_INVENTORY_DOC_SRV/overview). You can count items and post differences on both document and item level. The service can be consumed by external systems.
